entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
